name: Frog Rampage
description:
Dash, croak, and tongue lash various creatures to grow in size and reach the great lily pad in the sky!

Frog Rampage is a single player, top-down, action, eat-to-grow game inspired by the games Tasty Planet, Agar.io, and Feeding Frenzy.

Play as a mutant tadpole with an insatiable hunger, eating creatures of all shapes and sizes but watch out! You can only eat things smaller than you are. Start as a tadpole, and evolve into a froglet, frog, and finally a flying frog lord, growing in size along the way.

This game was created for the "My First Game Jam" game jam in February 2023. This was the culmination of 2 weeks effort by a 6 person team
